meanings.sent1: The idea was accepted by everyone in the group.
meanings.sent2: Her accepted proposal was met with applause.
meanings.sent3: The accepted solution to the puzzle was surprisingly simple.
meanings.sent4: His accepted leadership style set a positive example for the team.
meanings.sent5: The accepted tradition brought joy to all who participated.

meanings.sent1: The gift was accepted with a grateful smile.
meanings.sent2: She felt accepted by her new friends at school.
meanings.sent3: The accepted invitation to the party made her day.
meanings.sent4: His accepted apology helped mend their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The accepted help from strangers warmed her heart.

meanings.definition: Believed or recognized as true or valid
meanings.sent1: The accepted theory was taught in all schools.
meanings.sent2: His accepted explanation cleared up the confusion.
meanings.sent3: The accepted fact made her question her assumptions.
meanings.sent4: Their accepted evidence convinced even the skeptics.
meanings.sent5: The accepted truth finally came to light.
